name: test_e2e_with_logs[008_SQLI_BOOL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_001` |
| **Name** | Classic boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' OR '1'='1`
